attributes.action: Stop turning back the clocks in Winter to reduce tonnes of c02 used by earlier light up time
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: THis has been rejected by you as similiar to another petition.  My petition is because of the carbon emissions saved by having an hour more light in the evenings.  Street, business and residential lighting will make a huge saving both financially and environmentally.  Also less road accidents involving school children leaving school.
